model_id: Unique identifier for all the PDXs derived from the same tissue sample
name: Most comman name associate with model. Please use the CCLE name if available
type: Type of organoid or cell model
parent_id: Please add the model Id of the model used to generate the model. If the model was not in this set, please refer to it by external id
comments: Add crucial comments about the model that cannot be expressed by other fields
supplier: Please provide the suplies brief acronym or name followed by a colon and thel number or name use to reference the model
external_ids: Depmap accession, Cellusaurus accession or other id. Please place in comma separated list
publications: If model has been part of a published study include pubmed IDs separated by commas.

name: free text
type: One of the following: organoid, CRC, 3-D other, cell model
growth_properties: One of the following: embedded 3d culture, adherent, mix of adherent and suspension, suspension
comments: heterotopic, orthotopic, not collected, or not provided.
supplier: free text , not collected or not provided
